Nieser et al. (2005)
established the subgenus
Unguinecta
, and placed five species in it:
M. polhemusi Nieser, 2000
,
M. khasiensis Hutchinson, 1940
,
M. matsumurai Miyamoto, 1965
,
M. melanochroa Nieser, Chen & Yang, 2005
, and
M. waltoniana Hutchinson, 1940
. Among these,
M. khasiensis
and
M. waltoniana
were transferred from the subgenus
Mesonecta
.
